This website hosts a number of interactive graphics for exploring the City Melbourne's pedestrian data. You can find the code used to generate the following examples [here](https://github.com/cpsievert/pedestrians/tree/master/docs):

* [Missingness by time](missing-by-time) (with corresponding [video](https://vimeo.com/189035350))
* [`stl()` tour](stl-tour) (with corresponding [video](https://vimeo.com/189170669))
* [cognostics tour](cog-tour) (with corresponding [video](https://vimeo.com/189187319))
* [Hierarchical clustering](tour-dendro) (with corresponding [video](https://vimeo.com/189670650))
